column4: tried installing 804 but grub is giving me grief. Error 17. Here's my setup www.rafb.net/p/nVF3GI51.html
WHERE IS GRUB INSTALLED?
I don't know where it installed
DID YOU TELL IT TO INSTALL GRUB TO THE 1ST HARD DRIVE?
didnt tell it anything when it comes to grub
ok it looks like you can boot to somethinf cause you can fdisk -l .... so can you get to a grub prompt and find grub?
I am booting the live cd
hang on... wife interruption
get to a grub prompt and type find /sbin/init
then type find /vmlinuz
that will show you all partitions with kernels
now type find /boot/vmlinuz
/boot/vmlinuz doesn't exist
the others came back with information?
sorry, what others?
find vmlinuz
find /vmlinuz returns /vmlinuz
right back. changing mac address if possible so I dont need my ubuntu proxy
so you're all set?

if your BIOS boot order and GRUB's PERCEIVED hard drive order don't quite jive, consider taking a look at /boot/grub/device.map, but be aware you might then also have to make changes in grub's menu.lst afterwards
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=442945 and scroll down to post by mbwardle
another helpful hint... ls -la /dev/disk/by-uuid will show you uuid of partitions and where they are
